content.p: Our position as a world-class university is confirmed by our ranking in the global league tables. We are proud to be a top 20 UK university (QS World University Rankings 2025) and our graduates are sought after by leading employers world-wide. We are committed to giving our students an unparalleled experience that helps to prepare them for life after university. Our rankings and achievements Results from recent assessments of teaching quality at the University including TEF and QAA. The university was rated seventh for research power in the latest Research Excellence Framework. The University of Nottingham's global review and financial statements
